text:
Hello,  I am a Full Stack Developer with nearly 8 years of professional experience. :hammer_and_wrench:

Skills Highlights:

Front-End: HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Redux, Vue.js, Angular.js, Next.js, Nuxt.js
Back-End: Node.js (ExpressJS, NestJS, Fastify), Python (Django, Flask), Java, C#
Mobile Development: React Native, Flutter and Dart
Database: MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL
Cloud Services: AWS (Lambda), Firebase, Digital Ocean
Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, DevOps

Why You Should Consider Me:

Proven track record of delivering secure, scalable, and accessible web applications.
Expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies.
Strong problem-solving skills with attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration.
I'm excited about new challenges and opportunities!  If you're looking for a dynamic and skilled developer, let's connect!
Feel free to reach via <mailto:it.avalancheDev@gmail.com|it.avalancheDev@gmail.com>.

Looking forward to contributing to innovative projects.
